Post.title: docker
Post._content:
## 

### 

Docker Hub  Docker  docker pull

```
$ docker pull ubuntu
```

 Docker Hub library




```
$ docker pull ubuntu:16.04
```

### 

```
$ docker images
```



```
$ docker system df
```

### 

```
$ docker image rm <> [<ID> ...]
```



```
$ docker image rm 501ad78535f0
$ docker image rm 501a
$ docker image rm centos
```

## 



### 

stopped

1.

```
$ docker run -it --rm -p 8888:8080 tomcat:8.0
```

2.

```
$ docker ps #
$ docker ps -a #
```


```

$ docker start <ID>
$ docker stop <ID>
```

###  exec 

docker exec  -i -t 

 -i  Linux 

 -it  Linux 

```
$ docker exec -i 69d1 bash
ls
bin
boot
dev
...

$ docker exec -it 69d1 bash
root@69d137adef7a:/#
```

 exit docker exec 

### 

```
$ docker export 7691a814370e > ubuntu.tar
$ cat ubuntu.tar | docker import - test/ubuntu:v1.0
```

### 

```
docker stop $(docker ps -q)
```

### 

```
docker rm $(docker ps -aq)
docker stop $(docker ps -q) & docker rm $(docker ps -aq) #
```

## 
```

#
$ docker run --name gaoxi-user-1 -p 18081:8080 -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime chaimm/tomcat:1.1

#mac
$ docker run --name gaoxi-user-1 -p 18081:8080 -e TZ="Asia/Shanghai" -it chaimm/tomcat:1.1 bash

$ docker run --name zookeeper -p 2181:2181 -p 10000:8080 chaimm/zookeeper-dubbo:1.0

$ docker run --name zookeeper-1 --restart always -d zookeeper:3.4.11

#zookeeper
$ docker save -o /opt/downloads/zookeeper-image.tar zookeeper:3.4.11

#
$docker load -i /opt/images/zookeeper-image.tar


#IP
$ docker inspect -f '{{.Name}} - {{.NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' $(docker ps -aq) 


docker ps	 containers
docker images	 images
docker rmi -f db7e8a0d84e3	 image
docker pause bb230bd64efa	 container  processes
docker unpause bb230bd64efa	 container  processes
docker logs bb230bd64efa	 container  log
docker stop bb230bd64efa	 container 
docker start bb230bd64efa	 container
docker commit bb230bd64efa ubuntu:12.04	commit container  bb230bd64efa  container id ubuntu:12.04  image 
docker run -it ubuntu:12.04 bash	 container 
```

```
docker run -d --name kong\
        -e "KONG_DATABASE=postgres" \
        -e "KONG_PG_HOST=192.168.200.11" \
        -e "KONG_PROXY_ACCESS_LOG=/dev/stdout" \
        -e "KONG_ADMIN_ACCESS_LOG=/dev/stdout" \
        -e "KONG_PROXY_ERROR_LOG=/dev/stderr" \
        -e "KONG_ADMIN_ERROR_LOG=/dev/stderr" \
        -p 8888:8000 \
        -p 8445:8443 \
        -p 8889:8001 \
        -p 8446:8444 \
        kong:latest
```

Post.title: GitHubHexoHTTPS
Post._content: **Hexo** Hexo Markdown **GitHub** , **GitHub Pages** GitHub ## Hexo ### Hexo - Node.js - Git npm Hexo ``` bash $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` Hexo Hexo ``` bash $ hexo init $ cd $ npm install initinstall ``` ``` bash . _config.yml package.json scaffolds source | _drafts | _posts themes ``` ## ### ``` bash $ hexo new "My New Post" ``` layout _config.yml default_layout ### ``` bash $ hexo server ``` ### ``` bash $ hexo clean ``` ### ``` bash $ hexo publish "My New Post" $ hexo generate --deploy ``` > - $ hexo publish > - $ hexo g -d ** Git hexo-deployer-git ** ``` bash $ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save ``` _config.yml: ``` bash deploy: type: git repo: branch: [branch] ``` | | | | :-------- | :----- | | repo | Repository | | branch | | ## ### Github Pagesusername.github.io username CNAME | | | | | :--------: | :-----: | :----: | | CNAME | @ | username.github.io | | CNAME | www | username.github.io | ### GitHub Pages GitHub Pages CNAMEhellozhang.xin ### GitHub Pages HTTPS - GitHub Pages ![Repository settings button](https://help.github.com/assets/images/help/repository/repo-actions-settings.png) - GitHubHTTPS ![Enforce HTTPS checkbox](https://help.github.com/assets/images/help/pages/enforce-https-checkbox.png) > Chrome **** http https F12 | Asset type | HTTP | HTTPS | | :--------: | :-----: | :----: | | CSS | | | | JavaScript | | | | Image | | |

Post.title: Docker
Post._content:
## Docker

### 

Docker  CentOS 7 64 3.10 

###  yum CentOS 7

step 1: 

```
sudo yum install -y yum-utils \
    device-mapper-persistent-data \
    lvm2
```

Step 2: 

```
sudo yum-config-manager \
    --add-repo \
    http://mirrors.aliyun.com/docker-ce/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
```

Step 3: Docker-CE

```
sudo yum makecache fast
sudo yum -y install docker-ce
```

Step 4: Docker

```
sudo service docker start
```

```
# 
# Docker-CE:
# Step 1: Docker-CE:
# yum list docker-ce.x86_64 --showduplicates | sort -r
#   Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile
#   Loaded plugins: branch, fastestmirror, langpacks
#   docker-ce.x86_64            17.03.1.ce-1.el7.centos            docker-ce-stable
#   docker-ce.x86_64            17.03.1.ce-1.el7.centos            @docker-ce-stable
#   docker-ce.x86_64            17.03.0.ce-1.el7.centos            docker-ce-stable
#   Available Packages
# Step2: Docker-CE: (VERSION17.03.0.ce.1-1.el7.centos)
# sudo yum -y install docker-ce-[VERSION]
```

### 

 Docker 
CentOS 

```
$ curl -fsSL get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh
$ sudo sh get-docker.sh --mirror Aliyun
```

 Docker CE  Edge 

## macOSDocker

### 

** Docker for Mac **  macOS 10.10.3 Yosemite ** Docker Toolbox **

###  ###

 Docker for Mac

 macOS  .dmg  Moby  Application 

## 

```
$ docker version

Client:
Version:      17.03.0-ce
API version:  1.26
Go version:   go1.7.5
Git commit:   3a232c8
Built:        Tue Feb 28 07:52:04 2017
OS/Arch:      linux/amd64
Server:
Version:      17.03.0-ce
API version:  1.26 (minimum version 1.12)
Go version:   go1.7.5
Git commit:   3a232c8
Built:        Tue Feb 28 07:52:04 2017
OS/Arch:      linux/amd64
Experimental: false
```



##  Docker CE 

```
$ sudo systemctl enable docker
$ sudo systemctl start docker
```

##  Docker CE

 Docker CE

```
$ sudo yum remove docker-ce
$ sudo rm -rf /var/lib/docker # 
```

## Docker

### 

Docker  CentOS 7 64 3.10 

###  yum CentOS 7

step 1: 

```
sudo yum install -y yum-utils \
    device-mapper-persistent-data \
    lvm2
```

Step 2: 

```
sudo yum-config-manager \
    --add-repo \
    http://mirrors.aliyun.com/docker-ce/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
```

Step 3: Docker-CE

```
sudo yum makecache fast
sudo yum -y install docker-ce
```

Step 4: Docker

```
sudo service docker start
```

```
# 
# Docker-CE:
# Step 1: Docker-CE:
# yum list docker-ce.x86_64 --showduplicates | sort -r

#   Loaded plugins: branch, fastestmirror, langpacks
#   docker-ce.x86_64            17.03.1.ce-1.el7.centos            docker-ce-stable
#   docker-ce.x86_64            17.03.1.ce-1.el7.centos            @docker-ce-stable
```

Post.title: JDK-Maven-node
Post._content:
## JDK
```
yum install java
```


```
# ls -lrt /usr/bin/java
/usr/bin/java -> /etc/alternatives/java
# ls -lrt /etc/alternatives/java
/etc/alternatives/java -> /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.161-0.b14.el7_4.x86_64/jre/bin/java
# cd /usr/lib/jvm
# ls
java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.212.b04-0.el7_6.x86_64
jre -> /etc/alternatives/jre
jre-1.8.0 -> /etc/alternatives/jre_1.8.0
jre-1.8.0-openjdk -> /etc/alternatives/jre_1.8.0_openjdk
jre-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.212.b04-0.el7_6.x86_64 -> java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.212.b04-0.el7_6.x86_64/jre
jre-openjdk -> /etc/alternatives/jre_openjdk
```

PATH
```
# export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jre-1.8.0-openjdk
```

## maven
```
# wget http://mirror.bit.edu.cn/apache/maven/maven-3/3.6.1/binaries/apache-maven-3.6.1-bin.tar.gz
# tar xzvf apache-maven-3.6.1-bin.tar.gz
```

Adding to PATH
```
export PATH=/root/apache-maven-3.6.1/bin:$PATH
```

## mysql
MySQL Yum Repository
```
# wget -i -c http://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql57-community-release-el7-10.noarch.rpm
# yum -y install mysql57-community-release-el7-10.noarch.rpm
# yum -y install mysql-community-server
```

MySQL
```
# sudo systemctl start mysqld.service
```

MySQL
```
# sudo systemctl status mysqld.service
```

Yum Repositoryyum
```
# yum -y remove mysql57-community-release-el7-10.noarch
```


```
# grep "password" /var/log/mysqld.log
```


```
ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'z?guwrBhH7p>';
```


```
grant all on *.* to root@'%' identified by 'z?guwrBhH7p>';
flush privileges;
```

## nginx
```
# yum install nginx
# service nginx start
# service nginx stop
# service nginx restart
```

nginx
```
# ps -ef | grep nginx
# find /|grep nginx.conf
```
Post.raw:

```
jre-openjdk -> /etc/alternatives/jre_openjdk
```

MySQL Yum Repository
```
# wget -i -c http://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql57-community-release-el7-10.noarch.rpm
# yum -y install mysql57-community-release-el7-10.noarch.rpm
# yum -y install mysql-community-server
```

MySQL
```
# sudo systemctl start mysqld.service
```

MySQL
```
# sudo systemctl status mysqld.service
```

Yum Repositoryyum
```
# yum -y remove mysql57-community-release-el7-10.noarch
```


```
# grep "password" /var/log/mysqld.log
```


```
ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'z?guwrBhH7p>';
```


```
grant all on *.* to root@'%' identified by 'z?guwrBhH7p>';
flush privileges;
```

## nginx
```
# yum install nginx
# service nginx start
# service nginx stop
# service nginx restart
```

nginx
```
# ps -ef | grep nginx
# find /|grep nginx.conf
```

Post.title: kongdocker
Post._content:
## Kong

Kong APIAPI Kong  API  Lua  Kong HTTP CORS Cross-origin Resource SharingTCPUDPAPI  nginx 

## 

1.kong-net:

```
docker network create kong-net
```

2. PostgreSQL 

```
docker run -d --name kong-database \
    --network=kong-net \
    -p 15432:5432 \
    -e "POSTGRES_USER=kong" \
    -e "POSTGRES_DB=kong" \
    -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro \ # 
    postgres:9.6
```

3.:

```
docker run --rm \
    --network=kong-net \
    -e "KONG_DATABASE=postgres" \
    -e "KONG_PG_HOST=kong-database" \
    -e "KONG_CASSANDRA_CONTACT_POINTS=kong-database" \
    kong kong migrations up
```

4.kong:

```
docker run -d --name kong \
    --network=kong-net \
    -e "KONG_DATABASE=postgres" \
    -e "KONG_PG_HOST=kong-database" \
    -e "KONG_CASSANDRA_CONTACT_POINTS=kong-database" \
    -e "KONG_PROXY_ACCESS_LOG=/dev/stdout" \
    -e "KONG_ADMIN_ACCESS_LOG=/dev/stdout" \
    -e "KONG_PROXY_ERROR_LOG=/dev/stderr" \
    -e "KONG_ADMIN_ERROR_LOG=/dev/stderr" \
    -e "KONG_ADMIN_LISTEN=0.0.0.0:8001, 0.0.0.0:8444 ssl" \
    -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro \ # 
    -p 18000:8000 \
    -p 18443:8443 \
    -p 18001:8001 \
    -p 18444:8444 \
    kong
```



```
Error: could not prepare Kong prefix at /usr/local/kong: nginx configuration is invalid (exit code 1):
nginx: the configuration file /usr/local/kong/nginx.conf syntax is ok
nginx: [alert] mmap(MAP_ANON|MAP_SHARED, 134217728) failed (12: Out of memory)
nginx: configuration file /usr/local/kong/nginx.conf test failed
```



```
sudo docker run -d --name kong \
    ...
```




```
$ curl -i http://localhost:8001/
```

### kong-dashboard  kong kong0.13

```
$ docker run --rm -p 8080:8080 pgbi/kong-dashboard start --kong-url http://kong-ip:8001
```

### pg
docker run -p 10080:80 \
--link kong-database:kong-database \
-e "PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL=user@domain.com" \
-e "PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD=SuperSecret" \
-d dpage/pgadmin4

Post.title: spingboot
Post._content:
Spring Boot 

## 

```xml
spring:
    mvc:
        static-path-pattern: /**
    resources:
         static-locations: classpath:/META-INF/resources/,classpath:/resources/, classpath:/static/, classpath:/public/
```

META-INF/resources > resources > static > public
addResourceLocations

```
spring:
    mvc:
        static-path-pattern: /**
    resources:
        static-locations: classpath:/META-INF/resources/,classpath:/resources/, classpath:/static/, classpath:/public/, file:${uploadfile}

uploadfile: /home/upload/
```

## @Configuration

```
@Configuration
public class ApplicationConfig extends WebMvcConfigurerAdapter {

    @Override
    public void addResourceHandlers(ResourceHandlerRegistry registry) {
        registry.addResourceHandler("/**")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/META-INF/resources/")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/resources/")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/static/")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/public/");
        registry.addResourceHandler("/upload/**").addResourceLocations("file:/home/upload/");
        super.addResourceHandlers(registry);
    }
}
```

### 

1. /
1.

```xml
    resources:
         static-locations: classpath:/META-INF/resources/,classpath:/resources/, classpath:/static/, classpath:/public/
```

META-INF/resources > resources > static > public
addResourceLocations

```
spring:
    mvc:
        static-path-pattern: /**
    resources:
        static-locations: classpath:/META-INF/resources/,classpath:/resources/, classpath:/static/, classpath:/public/, file:${uploadfile}

uploadfile: /home/upload/
```

## @Configuration

```
@Configuration
public class ApplicationConfig extends WebMvcConfigurerAdapter {

    @Override
    public void addResourceHandlers(ResourceHandlerRegistry registry) {
        registry.addResourceHandler("/**")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/META-INF/resources/")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/resources/")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/static/")
                .addResourceLocations("classpath:/public/");
        registry.addResourceHandler("/upload/**").addResourceLocations("file:/home/upload/");
        super.addResourceHandlers(registry);
    }
}
```

Post.title: frp
Post._content:
** frp **  tcp, udp, http, https 

## 

[Release](https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases)frp

### 

```
# wgetfrp
wget https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases/download/v0.13.0/frp_0.13.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz

# tartar.gz
tar -zxvf frp_0.13.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz

# cdrm
cd frp_0.13.0_linux_amd64
rm -f frpc
rm -f frpc.ini

# frps.inivi

vi frps.ini

[common]
bind_port = 7000
vhost_http_port = 80
vhost_https_port = 443

dashboard_port = 7500
dashboard_user = admin
dashboard_pwd = admin

subdomain_host = frps.com

# [common]bind_portfrpvhost_http_porthttp, dashboard_port subdomain_host

# frp

# 
./frps -c ./frps.ini
```

### 



```
[common]
server_addr = x.x.x.x
server_port = 7000

[web]
type = http
local_port = 80
custom_domains = no2.sunnyrx.com
```



[common]server_addrfrpipIPserver_portfrpbind_prot

[web]local_portwebhttp500080Web StationDS Photo

frp

```
./frpc -c ./frpc.ini
```

start proxy sucess

### frp

frpSSHXshellfrp

frpfrpfrpsupervisorwinsw, linuxwindows

1. supervisor

```
# 
supervisor 
supervisordsupervisorsupervisordsupervisor 
supervisorctlsupervisorprogram
```

```
# 
yum install supervisor

# 
systemctl enable supervisord 

# 
systemctl is-enabled supervisord

# supervisord
systemctl start supervisord 

# supervisord
systemctl status supervisord 

# supervisord
ps -ef|grep supervisord 

# 
systemctl stop supervisord

# 
systemctl restart supervisord
```

supervisor

```
/etc/supervisord.conf
/etc/supervisord.d/
```

/etc/supervisor.dfrps.inicommandfrps

```
[program:frps]
command = /opt/frp/frp_0.9.3_linux_amd64/frps -c /opt/frp/frp_0.9.3_linux_amd64/frps.ini
autostart = true
```

supervisor

2.winsw

[winsw](https://github.com/kohsuke/winsw/releases)Windowswinsw.exefrpc.exewinsw.exewinsw.xml

```
<service>
    <id>frp</id>
    <name>frp</name>
    <description>frp</description>
    <executable>frpc</executable>
    <arguments>-c frpc.ini</arguments>
    <logmode>reset</logmode>
</service>
```



```
winsw install
winsw uninstall
```

Post.title: If you are using vue-loader@>=10.0, simply update vue-template-compiler
Post._content:
## 

```
Module build failed: Error: 

Vue packages version mismatch:

- vue@2.5.17 (/Users/xinzhang/Documents/IdeaProjects/incubator-vue-antd-admin/node_modules/vue/dist/vue.runtime.common.js)
- vue-template-compiler@2.6.10 (/Users/xinzhang/Documents/IdeaProjects/incubator-vue-antd-admin/node_modules/vue-template-compiler/package.json)

This may cause things to work incorrectly. Make sure to use the same version for both.
If you are using vue-loader@>=10.0, simply update vue-template-compiler.
If you are using vue-loader@<10.0 or vueify, re-installing vue-loader/vueify should bump vue-template-compiler to the latest.
```

## 

vuevuevue-template-compiler

```
npm install vue@2.6.10 --save 
yarn add vue@2.6.10
```

Post.title: VuePress
Post._content:
**VuePress** Vue

## VuePress 

VuePressHexo 

```
.
 docs
   .vuepress
      config.js
   guide
      getting-started.md
      README.md
   README.md
 package.json
```

###  config.js

 []() 

```
module.exports = {
    base:'/vuepress/',
    title: 'Wizard',
    description: 'Welcome to Wizard site',
    themeConfig: {
        nav: [
            { text: 'Home', link: '/' },
            { text: '', link: '/guide/' },
            { text: 'VuePress', link: 'https://vuepress.vuejs.org/' },
        ],
        sidebar: { '/guide/': genSidebarConfig('') }
    }
}

function genSidebarConfig(title) {
    return [
        {
          title,
          collapsable: false,
          children: [
            '',
            'getting-started',
          ]
        }
      ]
}
```

### package.json



```
{
  "scripts": {
    "docs:dev": "vuepress dev docs",
    "docs:build": "vuepress build docs",
    "deploy": "gh-pages -d docs/.vuepress/dist",
    "deploy:build": "npm run docs:build && gh-pages -d docs/.vuepress/dist"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "gh-pages": "^2.0.0"
  }
}
```

### 



```
# VuePress
npm install -g vuepress

# 
npm install

# 
npm run docs:dev

# 
npm run docs:build
```

### Github Page

1. 

> - https://{USERNAME}.github.io{USERNAME}.github.io
> - https://{USERNAME}.github.io/{REPO}/{REPO}

2.  

```
# url
git remote add origin https://<USERNAME>.github.io/<REPO>.git   

# 
git push -u origin master  
```

3. 

```
# gh-pages
$ sudo npm run deploy:build
```


```
> npm run docs:build && gh-pages -d docs/.vuepress/dist

> vuepress build docs

 WAIT  Extracting site metadata...
[13:51:40] Compiling Client
[13:51:40] Compiling Server
(node:2939) DeprecationWarning: Tapable.plugin is deprecated. Use new API on `.hooks` instead
[13:51:45] Compiled Server in 5s
[13:51:49] Compiled Client in 9s
 WAIT  Rendering static HTML...

 DONE  Success! Generated static files in docs/.vuepress/dist.

Published
```

 GitHub  gh_pages  **setting** 

https://{USERNAME}.github.io/{REPO}

```
module.exports = {
    base:'/vuepress/',

}
```
